DOC.brief_summary: Safety Pharmacokinetics Two Doses PT010 Healthy Adult Subjects Japanese Descent Following Single Dose After Chronic Dosing 7 Days .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized , Crossover Safety Pharmacokinetics Study PT010
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase I , single-center , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , two period , ascend dose , cross-over study assess safety PK two dos PT010 healthy adult subject Japanese descent . Safety PK assess follow single dose twice-daily ( BID ) chronic dose 7 day .
